scripts.build: cross-env LOCALE=es  cross-env LOCALE=nl nuxt build
scripts.generate:weed:fr: cross-env LOCALE=weed_fr NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=WEED nuxt generate
scripts.generate:weed:en: cross-env LOCALE=weed_en NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=WEED nuxt generate
scripts.generate:weed:de: cross-env LOCALE=weed_de NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=WEED nuxt generate
scripts.generate:ru: cross-env LOCALE=ru NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=NORMAL nuxt generate
scripts.generate:es: cross-env LOCALE=es NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=NORMAL nuxt generate
scripts.generate:nl: cross-env LOCALE=nl NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=NORMAL nuxt generate
scripts.generate:zh: cross-env LOCALE=zh NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=NORMAL nuxt generate
scripts.generate:sv: cross-env LOCALE=sv NODE_ENV=production COMPILATION=NORMAL nuxt generate
